idea:
 Manages and oversees the packaging staff on designated shift to achieve operational objectives.
 Observes, analyzes, and researches packaging line operation to develop and implement scientific and efficient process.
 Responsible & Manages the Brand participating in PAN India & Abroad Exhibitions.
 Effectively upsell and cross-sell various products to customers for their packaging needs.
 Proactively establish and maintain effective working team relationships with all support departments.
 Implements quality control check to ensure the packaging meets environment, health, and safety regulations.
 Provides staff with directions on materials and equipment for each package.
 Managing subordinate staff in the day-to-day performance of their jobs.
 Ensuring that project goals are met and adhered to approved budgets.
name: PACKBEE

idea:
Magic Institute of Excellence (MIE) is a Training & Consulting firm, which provides support solutions to MBA and Engineering institutions to scaleup their quality of Education and become a brand. The vision of the company is to transform the mindset of people towards education. It main offers Corporate readiness programs (CRP) and Leadership Development programs (LDP) for the student community to ensure the holistic development of candidates and build-up various forms of Human Intelligence Quotient. i.e.  Intellectual, Emotional and Spiritual Quotient.

22nd July 2017, the company was incepted and since then it is working closely with 45+ Institutions across Mumbai and Pune; Trained 4500+ students; 300+ Workshops; 1500+ hours of Training engagement.


Recently the company has started a new Arm in Corporate Training and Corporate Placements, where they have developed various technology-based tools and innovative processes to simplify the Talent Management Process. It ensures a holistic assessment of candidates on Knowledge, Skills, Talent and Personality factors so that a perfect fitment can happen in the industry. This reduces Attrition, Increases Employee Engagement with Job as well as the company and elevates the involvement from head to heart.


Founders' Profile: MIE was founded by 2 best friends Mr. Prathamesh Veling and Mr. Vishal Bhojani. Prathamesh is had rich experience in the field of Market Research, Analytics and Strategy and formal education in Engineering, MBA, MA (Eco) and MA (Psy). While Vishal is a commerce grad, MBA Finance, and X-Investment Banker.
name: MAGIC BUSINESS VENTURES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: GoApptiv private Limited, startup founded in Mar 2016 is set up with an objective of building digital platforms which can help companies operating in healthcare space to adopt digital business models thereby bring efficiency & cost optimization
name: GOAPPTIV PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
At Triosas we have developed a software solution to protect the IP of OEM, to provide genuine products to the consumer, improve brand reputation and revenue losses of the OEM by overcoming the problem of counterfeiting.

The most fundamental features of the software include

Counterfeit protection: using Unique-Id (QR code); location-based verification; blockchain track & trace in supply chain.

Immediate counterfeit identification and reporting

Authentication by the consumer: by simply scanning the QR code on the product

Customer loyalty program: enormous amount of information is generated in the authentication process this data is then processed using ML to identify the behavioral patterns of the consumer to develop a customer loyalty program. And to identify possible counterfeiting sites to take required legal action.

Concluding, Triosas provides a multi-layered encryption solution to overcome the problem of counterfeiting and the improve the revenue losses, brand reputation and increase the customer base using loyalty program.
name: Triosas Technologies Pvt. ltd.
